data.name: Http Service Health
data.description: The HTTP Health Service Dashboard provides a comprehensive view of the health and performance metrics of HTTP services, enabling quick identification of potential issues and trends.

markdown.markdownText:
**Http Health Service**
![Http Health Service](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSLvHCH9tEvuUoktvl3g_MyEyxxeIXHUx5lug&s) 



The HTTP Health Service Dashboard provides a comprehensive view of the health and performance metrics of HTTP services, enabling quick identification of potential issues and trends. 
This dashboard serves as a powerful tool for monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing HTTP services, ensuring they perform efficiently and reliably. It empowers teams to quickly identify bottlenecks, track trends, and maintain the overall health of the system.

**Use Cases Covered**

* Error Rate
* Latency
* Transaction Per Sec/Min
* Latency per service (p99,p95,p50)
* Success/Error Request
* Schema Registry Per Service
* Request By Service Name, Status Code

widgets.title: Schema registry max time per service
Schema registry max time per method
